room_title: Escape room "X-Mission" by AmeriEscape Room in Las Vegas
room_address: 210 E Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89104
room_description:
A group of multinational hackers who call themselves Breaker has launched a coordinated series of attacks across the globe targeting banking, communication, and government sites. They have struck in several major cities and the destruction and panic continue. Their end goal is to crush the world economy.
International stock market servers are currently under attack, and the virus only needs 60 minutes to upload before it destroys the world economy. As the greatest computer hacker at the FBI, your mission is to stop them.
